Aug. 14, 1937 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship) 10 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-open-championship

Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £14, 3rd £10, 4th £5. 11 bands competed.
